    • Constructor Detail

      • RobotPlayer

        public RobotPlayer(int health,
           java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture,
           java.awt.image.BufferedImage textureBoost,
           java.awt.image.BufferedImage textureBrake,
           int x,
           int y)
        Create a new robot for a player.
        Parameters:
        health - Health of the robot. (Usually 100)
        texture - Texture of robot.
        textureBoost - Texture of the robot while boosting.
        textureBrake - Texture of the robot while braking.
        x - X position of the robot.
        y - Y position of the robot.
